price: 13. que je n’en aie la poitrine serrée et que ma langue ne puisse se délier. Veuille envoyer (avec moi) Aaron.
arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدۡرِي وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِي فَأَرۡسِلۡ إِلَىٰ هَٰرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayaḍīqu ṣadrī walā yanṭaliqu lisānī fa-arsil ilā hārūna
